item.description:
Update

So... I don't want to go to Mantra after the movie. Anybody who does can head on over there and meet folks from the group going to the later movie. They get out of the theater 45 minutes after the early group, which is plenty of time to get through one or two cosmos!

I'll go to one of the usual places, and take anyone who's willing to go with me: Rock Bottom (brew pub), Jacob Wirth (German), California Kitchen (good for a small group), etc.

Original Post

This is our second Sex and the City meetup event, for the 6:30 show on Friday, May 30, because the 7:15 sold out. I strongly recommend buying your tickets before Friday at
http://www.fandango.c....

My group will also be going to Mantra, but of course we'll arrive 45 minutes ahead of Diane's group.

"The most exciting, challenging and significant relationship of all is the one you have with yourself. And if you find someone to love the YOU you love, well, that's just fabulous."..


Synopsis

Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, and Cynthia Nixon reprise their roles from the original HBO series on the big screen. Academy Award-winning actress Jennifer Hudson (Dreamgirls) also joins the cast of the film and will play Carrie Bradshaw's assistant, a new character to be introduced in the film.
Cast: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon, Chris Noth
Director: Michael Patrick King
Genres: Sex Comedy, Comedy, Urban Comedy

Trailer
<object width="425" height="355"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my red hat with the meetup logo. If the movie is upstairs, I'll be waiting by the tables near the window. If downstairs, I'll be behind the rope where the tickets are torn across from the popcorn stand.
item.why: Because you're still watching the repeats like me!!
item.name: Sex and the City
